ygData.subject: Re: Level 11 Spell - Cinda Charismatic Carrillion (sp)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I finally got revenge on Dragoon Zytl over the weekend.  I was out looking for giants or griffins to charm when I heard someone blathering something about
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 5 Oct 1999, J L Smith wrote:
>
> Now if I only remembered to use the ring when Dragoon Lyst (sp) took a
> dislike to me in W Commons. :p

I finally got revenge on Dragoon Zytl over the weekend. I was
out looking for giants or griffins to charm when I heard
someone blathering something about the only good wood elf
being a dead one. I'd tried to solo him before, and managed
to get him down to half before he got 4 or 5 lucky hits in and
I had to run. (It was a very close thing since he cast
engulfing darkness on me, which I found out overrides
Accelerando unless you have Accelerando playing when he casts
it and you don't stop it.)

He wasn't holding his normal halberd so I asked over /guildsay
if anyone was nearby WC and willing to help me take out Zytl
with a dirk. A monk was in Kithicor so he quickly zoned into
WC. I stopped running in circles and lead Zytl to the
Kithicor zone. We grouped and proceeded to pound him into the
ground. At L35 and 30, we were both left at about half health
when we'd finished. He did indeed have the dragoon dirk, so
you can get it off him if he's not holding a halberd.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
